original_conversation.content: I'm trying to use promotional code SAVE25 on my order, but the system keeps rejecting it.
Thank you for contacting us. Let me investigate that promotional code issue immediately. May I have your account email address to pull up your information?
Certainly. The account is registered under sarah.mitchell@techcorp.com.
Perfect. I've located your account, customer ID C-482917-M. I can see you're attempting to apply SAVE25 to your current cart totaling $347.82.
That's correct. The email I received yesterday said the code was valid through December 31st.
I understand.
Can you verify whether this code should be working for my account?
I've checked the promotion parameters. The SAVE25 code requires a minimum purchase of $400.00 before taxes, and your current subtotal is $347.82, which is $52.18 below the threshold.
The promotional email didn't mention any minimum purchase requirement. I have it right here.
I apologize for that oversight in our communication. Let me review the email campaign settings for batch EMC-112023-B7 that was sent to your segment yesterday.
I'd appreciate that. This promotion influenced my decision to place this order today.
You're absolutely right. I've confirmed the email template didn't include the minimum purchase disclaimer. This was an error on our part, and I'm going to honor the 25% discount for you.
Thank you. How will you apply the discount to my current order?
I'm applying a manual override credit of $86.96 to your order, which equals the full 25% discount. Your new total will be $260.86 instead of $347.82.
Perfect. Will I receive an updated order confirmation showing this adjustment?
Certainly. You'll receive an updated invoice within 5 minutes to your registered email. The confirmation number will be ORD-7849523-WK with the adjusted pricing clearly displayed.
Excellent. Can you also ensure I'm not excluded from future promotions because of this issue?
Absolutely. I've added notation TKT-4421896 to your account documenting this was our error. Your account remains in good standing with priority status P2 for all future promotional offerings.
I appreciate your quick resolution. Is there anything else I need to do on my end?
Nothing further required from you. The discount is applied, your order will ship tomorrow via our standard 2-day service, and I've credited your account with 500 loyalty points for the inconvenience.
